Includes a ReasonForVisit command with appropriate details
Documents HistoryOfPresentIllness with key symptoms and duration
Uses LabOrder to document ordered lab tests including iron, thyroid, and B12
Records any medication changes or issues using StopMedication for iron supplements
Captures ReviewOfSystem with relevant patient-reported symptoms
Includes FollowUp command for future patient encounters
